general_info.name: CNSTRNT
general_info.creator: Imco van Gent
general_info.description: CNSTRNT stands for constraint. It is a tool that collects different constraint functions (wing loading, fuel tank volume, etc.).

execution_info.description: Determination of the wing loading constraint w.r.t. a maximum allowed wing loading.
Determination of the constraint w.r.t. volume of the fuel tanks in the wing and required fuel volume.
